title: OKAY GUYS SERIOUSLY ENOUGH IS ENOUGH YOU CAN'T SAY THE N-WORD
body:
REALLY!... UGHHHHH! WHY DOES THIS HAVE TO BE SAID IN 2018???????? COME ON JUST GROW THE F-WORD UP YOU GOSH DANG CHILDREN. 

AHAHA LOOK I SAID IT AGAIN I DISREGARDED THE FEELINGS OF AN ENTIRE SECTION OF THE LEAGUE FANBASE IN MY ACT OF GAMER RAGE!!!!!!!

WHOAH EPIC KID! I CAN ALMOST HEAR YOU SNORTING ON THE OTHER END OF YOUR MICROPHONE AS YOUR FINGER INSTITUTIONALLY REACHES FOR THE N KEY. I GET IT YEAH! MAYBE YOUR ANGRY THAT YOUR KARMA TOP LANE DIED AGAIN OR YOU LOST TO AN AP LUCIAN BUT IT ISN'T OKAY!!!

SAY IT ONE MORE TIME KID! I DARE YOU! ITS A REPORTABLE OFFENCE!

JUST BECAUSE I AM BAD AT THE GAME DOESN'T GIVE YOU THE RIGHT TO USE THAT WORD

FOUR LETTERS OF HATRED

A WORD I WON'T SAY BUT YOU KNOW THE ONE

YOU THINK I AM BAD AND NEW TO A GAME SO U USE THAT N-WORD

KNOCK

IT

OFF
{{sticker:sg-shisa}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

> Nice?

> Works fine for me.

NO NO NO! U KNOW THE ONE! 1 N and 2 O's Followed by a B. THAT DISGUSTING WORD ARHHEBFBCHJMEDFSJJKJ
